content: or decreases when there are only two st left between the center and first side markers purl one row as usual then k2t all the way around removing all but center marker as you go switch to dp needles if needed during the following steps purl all st k2t all the way around again purl all st k2t all the way around cut yarn and run it through remaining st cinch in keeping with looseness of piece and tie off weave in ends
